channel.title: Miro on Mutt0-ds Notes

item.title: How we test 100k-Line Nested JSON trees without going insane
item.description:
Today I want to share an interesting challenge that’s been bugging me since I joined InvestSuite last December. It’s stories like this that makes me happy to be a developer, being able to address things that are ruining my day and get rid of them. It feels so satisfying.

We work with massive JSON files (deeply nested, sprawling structures), and we needed a way to test them reliably. The stability of StoryTeller, our personalized report engine, depended on it.
